InstanceNumber.description: Instance number of the USB Port

Location.description: Location of the USB Device on the server

enumDescriptions.Back: Located on the rear panel of the server.
enumDescriptions.Front: Located on the front bezel of the server.
enumDescriptions.Internal: Located internally within the server chassis.

PCIBusNumber.description: PCI Bus number of the USB controller that controls this USB port

PCIDeviceNumber.description: PCI Device Number of the USB Controller that controls this USB Port.

PCIFunctionNumber.description: PCI Function Number of the USB Controller that controls this USB Port.

ParentHubInstance.description: Parent Hub Instance that provides an instance number of the internal hub this USB Port is connected to.

SharedCapability.description: Shared Capability of the USB Port

enumDescriptions.UnsharedManagement: Not shared as a Management Port.
enumDescriptions.SharedManagementPhysicalSwitch: Shared management port w/ physical switch to control whether muxed to iLO or host.
enumDescriptions.SharedManagementAutomaticControl: Shared management port w/ automatic control of whether muxed to iLO or host.

SpeedCapability.description: USB speed capability of the USB port as configured by the BIOS during POST.

UEFIDevicePath.description: UEFI Device Path of USB Endpoint. Standardized text representation of the UEFI device path, in UTF-8 format

title: #HpeUSBPort.v2_0_0.HpeUSBPort
